participant_1.background:
My family is my biggest treasure.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I went to an interfaith event last year, and it was really wonderful to see people from different religions come together in prayer.
i take things very literally.
I do not have my own home yet.

participant_2.background:
I like to go for walks in the park, even though my feet smell.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonalds.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i love lasagna like i am garfield.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.

content.text: I go for walks in the park, even though my feet smell.
That sounds lovely.  I like walks in the park too.  I'm trying to get more exercise these days.
It's a great way to clear your head.
Yeah it is.  I also like to listen to music while I walk.  What kind of music do you like?
Me too!  What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands.  I love The Beatles too.  Do you like any modern rock bands?
Not really.  I'm more into classic rock.
That's cool.  I like some modern rock, but I also like classic rock.  What do you like to do when you're not walking or listening to music?
That's cool.  I like to write too.  Do you write fiction or nonfiction?
I write both.  I like to write short stories and poems.
That's great.  I've been trying to write more lately.  I'm working on a novel.
That's awesome.  I would love to read it when you're finished.
Thanks!  I'll let you know when it's done.
